description: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on July 27th, 2023 by 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
duration_in_months: ,note: based on the starting and ending dates of the contract
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### EP076-240165 EDSC Heavy Duty Shelving

**Referencing Information:**

* Amended Solicitation Number: WS4099261580
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: 2023-07-14
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-27T14:00:00

**Procurement Details**

* Procurement Category: Government of Canada
* Procurement Method: Competitive Bid
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Unspsc: 56101700 (Office furniture), 56110000 (Commercial and industrial furniture)
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contractor Information**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
* Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Notice Details**

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Notice URL: [Notice Details](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16876815?extsite=MTY4NzY4MTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Contact Person: Husain (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [husain.al-amidi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:husain.al-amidi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Important Notice**

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission on or before July 27th, 2023 by 14:00 EDT. Submissions after this time will be declared non-responsive.
